original_title: 「オジサンが好きすぎて無償でパパ活してました」 元生徒会長の誰にも言えなかった性癖がバクハツ！真性中年男性好きアイドル級美少女AV Debut！
overview: The debut work of a beautiful girl who likes authentic uncles! Hanasaki Koharu-chan, who I met through a dad activity app. She says, "I haven't met an old man in my private life..." She's a genuine middle-aged lover who has never received any pocket money. I'm so jealous that I can have a free man with such a cute girl! Daddy activity also comes with danger ... So I persuaded AV appearance! A gentle gaze that looks at the old man, a M-like that accepts anything, and her title of former student council president makes me feel strangely erotic!
title: “I Love Old Men!” Former Student Council President’s Sex Preferences Revealed! Idol-class Beauty Loves Middle-aged Men Makes AV Debut! Koharu Hanasaki
